text: @LaNicole1971 Personally I would not go. You never know how people will react especially if drinking alcohol. Masks are to mainly to protect others, not yourself. Have seen videos where MAGA purposely cough on those wearing masks. Covid-19 now seems to be everywhere in 🇺🇸 #StayHomeStaySafe
